channel.title: ISO milestones?
channel.description: Are there milestones on github to work towards releasing Kicksecure as an ISO? I know several developers who may be interested in helping to move this along, and would like to know where to point them.

item.title: ISO milestones?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
A task with “lower difficulty” which does not require any knowledge about derivative-maker (Kicksecure build script):

  • live-build: add dracut support

build-steps.d/3300_create-iso-chroot

./build-steps.d/3300_create-iso-chroot --target iso --flavor kicksecure-xfce

Read full topic
